Package org.rcsb.mbt.model.filters

This package provides classes which enable filtering or subsetting of a structure's constituent components.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IStructureComponentFilter Defines a standard interface to describe a filter implementation class.
 

Class Summary
AtomFilter Defines a StructureComponentFilter sub-class which handles Atom type StructureComponent objects.
CAlphaAtomFilter Defines an AtomFilter sub-class which accepts only C-Alpha Atom objects.
RelationFilter Defines a StructureComponentFilter sub-class which handles the filtering of StructureComponent objects that are related to the StructureComponent subject parameter.
 

Package org.rcsb.mbt.model.filters Description

This package provides classes which enable filtering or subsetting of a structure's constituent components. For example, an instance of the CAlphaAtomFilter class could be passed to the "createStructureComponentIterator" method of the Structure class in order to create a StructureComponentIterator. Subsequent calls to this iterator's "next" method would enable an application to step through only C-Alpha atoms within the sturcture.
